item.title: The all-in-one serverless backend infrastructure of your dreams
item.description: The all-in-one serverless backend infrastructure of your dreams Mission Empower all developers with the cutting-edge backend technology with ease. Problem Cloud functions are broken (Cold starts, edge, versioning) Backend infrastructure devops work is mundane (Expensive, mundane, pricy) No existing solution that tangles both serverless functions with database infrastructure Solution Abstract away cloudflare workers + fauna db Write all database logic in code (indexes, mutations, query) Preview infrastructure in pull requests
